problem:
In a certain class, L classmate is shorter than X classmate, Y classmate is shorter than L classmate, but M classmate is shorter than Y classmate, so Y classmate is shorter than J classmate.Q: Which of the following statement premises must be added to launch the above statement logically? Answer Choices: (A)Class J is taller than Class L. (B)X is taller than J. (C)Class L is taller than Class J. (D)J is taller than M.
A: Among A through D, the answer is
